text: Mexico–Belize border at Consejo Consejo is a village in the north of Corozal District, Belize. Consejo is located on a point of land where the bays of Corozal and Chetumal meet. Consejo is about 8 miles (12.9 km) from the district capital of Corozal Town, and across the water from Chetumal, Mexico. It also features a subdivision/neighborhood of waterfront or near waterfront homes named Consejo Shores. Category:Populated places in Corozal District Category:Belize–Mexico border crossings
title: Consejo
